title: Did a 1977 ‘Time’ Story Offer Tips on ‘How to Survive the Coming Ice Age’?
subtitle: While a number of media outlets reported on some briefly-lived scientific fears over global cooling in the 1970s, viral images purporting to show a cover story on the topic are doctored.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: 'Time' ran a cover story titled "How to Survive the Coming Ice Age" in 1977.
